name: tekstil-ai-studio-offline
description: Yerel disk üzerinde görsel arama ve font tanıma yapabilen tamamen offline Electron uygulaması.

scripts.dev: npx kill-port 3001 && cross-env PORT=3001 concurrently "npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:%PORT% && npm run electron-dev"
scripts.dev-win: npx kill-port 3001 && cross-env PORT=3001 concurrently "npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:%PORT% && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.dl-model: curl -fL -o electron/models/mobilenetv2.onnx https://github.com/onnx/models/raw/main/validated/vision/classification/mobilenet/model/mobilenetv2-7.onnx || curl -fL -o electron/models/mobilenetv2.onnx https://media.githubusercontent.com/media/onnx/models/main/validated/vision/classification/mobilenet/model/mobilenetv2-7.onnx || curl -fL -o electron/models/mobilenetv2.onnx https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/onnx/models@main/validated/vision/classification/mobilenet/model/mobilenetv2-7.onnx

engines._comment: Node.js 22 ve üzeri ile native modüller çalışmaz, lütfen Node 18 veya 20 kullanın.
